dct_title_s: De gelegentheyt van 't Paradys ende 't landt Canaan mitsgaders de eerst bewoonde landen der patriarchen
dct_description_sm: uyt de H. Schrifture ; en verscheyden auctoren by een gestelt door Jacob Savry.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
2 bar scales on map given in "Gemene duytsche mylen" and "Uren gaens inhoudende".
Shows topography, drainage, boundaries, places of historical interest.
Features illustrations of a ship, sea creature, compass rose, and settlements throughout map.
4 pictorial vignettes: [1] Genesis 3.6 -- [2] Tharah... -- [3] Abram ende Lot... -- [4] Genesis 3.24.
